entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
